attributes.action: Lower the tariffs  for gas and electricity.
attributes.additional_details:
Lower gas and electricity tariffs and remove VAT on all household bills.
Working class people cannot afford this latest increase of 54% to their utility bills. Tariffs are charged the same to all customers across the country. Salaries are not the same. Government ministers and CEO’s of companies are able to afford increases. All OFCOM have done is increase the populations anxiety and worry as to how they are going to make ends meet.
attributes.background: Lower the price gap instantly and remove VAT from all household bills.

rejection.details:
The energy cap is set by Ofgem, which is operationally independent of the Government and Parliament.

You can find out more about the increase to the energy price cap here: https://www.ofgem.gov.uk/publications/price-cap-increase-ps693-april

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Cut the VAT charged on energy bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597470

Subsidise energy prices to offset any increase in the energy price cap: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606586

Tax 50% of the Energy Companies profits to help households pay bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607983
